title: How raging affects everyone in your team.
body: s you guys know everyone will get banners and logo in 2 days and sadly thats not enough time to climb to gold and above to get the skin unless you go 24/7 without sleep and just play(Im a student and exams are coming so I can't do that sadly) and I learned it the hardway that raging would only get you down the ladder and not help you climb.You guys might think that I'm silver V so therefore I have no knowledge about this but trust me,when I finished my placement I was placed at silver IV and every rank game I would rage at my team mate which would only not affect me but my team as well.Raging would make you tilt.I can gurantee you that tilting is one of the major factors that you are losing games.My friend who was placed at bronze III got to gold V and I duo'ed with him and observed his playstyle,manners etc.He was not the best in terms of mechanics but he surely did have a positive attitude which helped the team.If you rage at your team,your team would tilt causing that extra pressure to build up and eventually they would f-up more.In general all I'm trying to say is that,have a positive attitude and you will start winning games.I learned that the hardway ;(.Remember everyone makes mistakes so when they die because of one minor mistake DO NOT RAGE that would not fix the problem.
